group.groupDescription: SQL Server 2022 Setup configuration checks for rules group 'PreInstallRules'

RunRuleResult.description: Checks whether the account that is running SQL Server Setup has the right to back up files and directories, the right to manage auditing and the security log and the right to debug programs.
RunRuleResult.message: The account that is running SQL Server Setup has the right to back up files and directories, the right to manage auditing and security log and the right to debug programs.

RunRuleResult.description: Checks if a pending computer restart is required. A pending restart can cause Setup to fail.
RunRuleResult.message: The computer does not require a restart.

RunRuleResult.description: Checks whether the WMI service is started and running on the computer.
RunRuleResult.message: The Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) service is running.
